CustomField.description: This is the Legal representation this AI client uses. You will be able to select from accounts that are the AI Service Provider Record Type.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the Legal representation this AI client uses. You will be able to select from accounts that are the AI Service Provider Record Type.
CustomField.label: AI - Legal

lookupFilter.errorMessage: You will only be able to select from accounts that have the AI Service Provider Record Type. If the account you're looking for is missing, add it as an AI Service Provider.
